author: humbedooh
msg: initialize new projects with a base pmc name and web site address

author: pderop
msg: Committed a first candidate release process, which is now based on the simplest form of Apache release process: for now, we only release
a source distributions (apache-felix-dependencymanager-src.zip), with the necessary binary dependencies that are needed to compile the source dist (apache-felix-dependencymanager-deps.zip).
The only remaining thing to do is to check and finalize the dependencymanager/release/resources/deps/NOTICE and dependencymanager/release/resources/deps/LICENSE
files, which are incomplete. These files are the licenses for the binary dependencies used to compile the source distrib (bndtools jars, json, ...).
